name: Dead Edge
description:
Attention! The game has a certain screen with the end of the game! When you think, than game is over, move in "Kill Room" and move left and down. The critical damage from red cube will end the game.

This is scary game about a scientist who is stuck in a complex.

In this game, you will play the role of an AI that will have to explore the complex in the computer network in order to save the scientist

But who knows what might happen...

How are the topics covered in my game:

1.The boss: 

  • The boss as a big and strong enemy
  • A mentor in the form of a scientist who will help the player

2.On the edge:

  • The situation in the game is very tense, who knows what can happen...
